name: 2D Shooter (sophiagrady)
description:
2D shooter project.

For this space shooter themed project, I made a space shooter destroy enemy's to win the game.  

Modifications: 

1)  I played with the music by changing the pitch and spatial blend.

2)  I also changed the background by changing its color every level (first level blue, second level green, and third level red).

3) I also added a variety of planets and spaceships in the game. 

Created by: Sophia Grady
